Blog Projects About

Type2Learn - My first Chrome Extension

I am a big fan of productivity tools and always wanted to build a chrome extension. The browswer extensions are really powerful as you can run almost arbitrary Javascript over the DOM of any webpage. I had enjoyed practicing touch typing and racing with my friends online. Hitting two birds with one stone, I created Type2Learn - a browswer extension to practice touch typing and concentrate on your webpage. You can monitor your speed, errors you make, and accuracy in real-time!

Extensions i ❤️

Over the years I have discovered some cool and useful browser extensions which help me be more productive both on and off work. I used to use Google Chrome but after being tired of its high memory usage I switched to Brave - a chromium browser. These extensions work on Chrome and Chromium browsers and should be avalaible for other browsers also.
